name: Windows 3.1x
notes: Currently require to manually extract the contents of the install floppy disks into a single folder.

write_file.content:
[dosbox]
memsize = 64
[autoexec]
mount c $GAMEDIR/C
c:
cd windows
win

content:
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/win31x.conf
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: DISK1
- task:
    commands:
    - 'A:'
    - SETUP.EXE
    - EXIT
    drives:
      a: $DISC
      c: $GAMEDIR/C
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/win31x-install.conf
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/C
    file: mkdir
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/win31x-install.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- write_file:
    content: '[dosbox]

      memsize = 64

      [autoexec]

      mount c $GAMEDIR/C

      c:

      cd windows

      win'
    file: $GAMEDIR/win31x.conf
